priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Subject Characteristic Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89981

self.title: CDISC SEND Subject Characteristic Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology for the test codes concerned with the distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.
name: SEND Subject Characteristics Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Subject Characteristic Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: A secondary sequence of characters used to identify a subject.
A plan that specifies a diet, amount and schedule of nutritional intake.
The hue of a subject's hair or fur. (NCI)
A distinctive observable characteristic of an object. (NCI)
The geographic location of the organization that supplied the test subjects.
The name of the organization that supplied the test subjects. (NCI)
Numeric ID assignment by United States Department of Agriculture for test facilities.
